name: ALM - Asset Liability Management
description: The Asset Liability Management application covers the booking, amendment and cancellation of FX Cash trades

name: OTE - Orderbook and Trade Execution
description: Our Orders & Trade Execution (OTE) application demonstrates an order and trading venue, centred on a Passive Order Book

name: GGE - Gather, Group, Email
description: A template application for gathering data via a pipeline, modifying, grouping together and emailing out

name: one-to-one - real-time reconciliation
description: A template application for providing a real-time one to one reconciliation and associated workflow capability

name: one-to-many - real-time reconciliation
description: A template application for providing a real-time one to many reconciliation and associated workflow capability
